title: [Health] Firearms have overtaken car crashes as main cause of premature US trauma deaths. Firearm homicides also increased, rising from 11,493 deaths in 2009 to 13,958 in 2018, equivalent to 633,656 years of potential life lost in 2018, up from 554,260 in 2009.
[Neuroscience] New project creates digital clones of human brains to help treat neurological disorders
